rows.label: qst001702_msg002
rows.name:
I put up a notice on the
board in Nharil Central
Plaza, but has anyone seen it?

rows.label: qst001702_msg003
rows.name:
No, I don't have time
to worry about that.

rows.label: qst001702_msg004
rows.name:
I have to finish this report, it
affects next term's budget...!

rows.label: qst001702_msg0102
rows.name:
And exactly three of them! You
saw my notice, didn't you?

rows.label: qst001702_msg0103
rows.name: I see. You've been a great help.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0104
rows.name:
I'm in charge of investigating the
monsters that inhabit Superbia.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0105
rows.name:
But to conduct the investigation,
I have to go to the site, right?

rows.label: qst001702_msg0106
rows.name:
The Thermal Exhaust Fork was a
difficult place for me to go, both
in terms of time and ability.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0107
rows.name:
I also have other monsters to
investigate, so I couldn't spend
all my time on the Noog Vamps.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0108
rows.name:
However, with the Whitescale Antennae
from the Noog Vamps, I can submit a
decent investigation report.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0109
rows.name:
And with this report, if
there's ever a time when we
have to fight Noog Vamps...

rows.label: qst001702_msg0110
rows.name:
it will be useful for the
soldiers of the Superbian army.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0111
rows.name:
Now, I must get back
to writing my report.

rows.label: qst001702_msg0112
rows.name:
Here is your promised reward.
Thank you again for your
investigation. I am truly grateful.
